scripts.install:clean: npx lerna clean -y && rm -rf node_modules && npm i
scripts.install:ci: npm install --ignore-scripts && lerna link && lerna bootstrap --since origin/master --include-dependencies
scripts.deploy: cd ./glitch-hosting; git pull; git add -A; git commit -m 'chore(deploy): :rocket:'; git push origin master; cd .. ; npm run shove
scripts.shove: git add -A; git commit -m 'chore(ci): test ci'; git push origin master
